_sText:
Feel free to message me with any questions by joining the following group and opening a chat with me @ [SG] Pauls Group
cp_lets_plays_tf2_v1
Before you read any further, this map REQUIRES a RESPAWN PLUGIN. The one I have on my server can be found HERE (RESPAWN SCRIPT)
If using Sourcemod, I suggest you install this map config plugin @ HERE (MAP CONFIGP PLUGIN) Add this to your server.cfg
      • sm_ar_enable 0
        Create a map config called cp_lets_plays_tf2_v1.cfg and within have:
      • sm_ar_enable 1
      • ar_respawn_delay 5
      • ar_respawn_msgs 0
      • ar_dissolve_ragdolls 1

Finally after endless hours of trying to get this map finished, im glad to announce the release of cp_lets_play_tf2_v1. This is a control point map (like the ones in tf2) where one team is attacking while the other defends. The attacking team must cap all 3 points in a timelimit, while the defenders must hold them off until the timer hits 0. Please do not rename the map as it will mess up the custom textures. Its cp_ prefix just in case more of these maps start appearing. But this will still be on minigames servers.
About The Map
  • Attacking/ Defending team swapper every round.
  • Seven classes to choose from.
  • 3 Control points (A, B and C).
  • Numerous teleport exit locations for engineer to set up.
  • Count down timer in skybox and at spawn.
  • Health Kits around the map.
  • Ammo Kits around the map.
  • Controllable teleport locations for engineer.
  • 4 minute round timer.
  • 4 additional minutes added to the clock once a point has been fully capped.
  • 60 second capping timer on each point.
  • 3D Skybox.
  • Custom radar map overview.
  • Tf2 like weapon strip on round win/lose.
  • And much more...
    This map requires team work and co-operation, when we was beta testing on a 30-40 slot server the map was as balanced as it probably will get. It comes down to how well your team work together and communicate with each other. If you would like to try this map visit steamgamers minigames server @ STEAMGAMERS.COM | MiniGames | *Funtastic* @ 72.26.196.164:27015
    Class Breakdown
    • Heavy
      • M249
      • Glock
      • x0.9 speed
      • 300 Health
    • Scout
      • Auto Shotgun
      • Glock
      • x1.33 speed
      • 125 Health
    • Engineer
      • Pump Shotgun
      • USP
      • x1.0 speed
      • 125 Health
      • Door will open a few seconds after the teleport exit breaks.
      • Ability to select the teams teleport exit. (Press e on the white cross)
      • Only one engineer class at one given time.
    • Demoman
      • Galil
      • Hegrenade
      • x0.97 speed
      • 175 Health
      • (Previously had nade respawn, but was crashing the map)
    • Medic
      • P90
      • Glock
      • x1.0 speed
      • 175 Health
      • Ability to heal himself and others (Healing trigger inside the whitebox)
    • Sniper
      • Scout
      • USP
      • x1.0 speed
      • 125 Health
    • Spy
      • Deagle
      • Auto Invisbility (7% visible)
      • x1.05 speed
      • 175 Health
    How to play
    DEFENDING
    ATTACKING
    Thanks to Mr. Late for the skeleton map from cp_grassland in TF2. Thanks to Bob Loblaw for putting up with my entity requests. :D I hope you enjoy the map. Please report any bugs on this page. Thanks!
